body_text:
I actually specifically didn't want a re-render. Essentially, a bug I ran into was that on each render, the random 'default' seed would change, causing a weird identicon swap on page load (showed one first, then the other). Setting the defaultIdenticonSeed on the actual instance was meant to avoid the additional re-render (vs using state).
I've moved this defaultIdenticonSeed declaration to a constructor instead!
